text:
Anxiety
   Assessment:
   Episodes of restlessness through out shift, does not follow commands
   consistently, combative with staff
   Action:
   Seroquel increased to   50mg  tid, attempts to reorient pt thru out
   shift, pt oob to chair.
   Response:
   Pt continued to wax and wane between epidsodes of resting quietly  to
   constanty fidgeting and restlessness and pull arm immobilziers
   Plan:
   Cont with seroquel as ordered, attempt to restablish normal sleeping
   pattern ? icu psychosis or neuro affects for sdh.  Inc activity to
   promote sleep patter during night
   Fever, unknown origin (FUO, Hyperthermia, Pyrexia)
   Assessment:
   Temp max  100.5,  one episode of diaphoresis, blood cx results still
   pending, urine cx negative for growth, sputum thick tannnish, pt unable
   to effectively clear secretions
   Action:
   Vanco dosing increased to 1500mg tid, Tylenol 650 given q 6 ,, pt
   suctioned numerous times for thick tan secretions, oral care given,
   nystatinoral  prn
   Response:
   Current temp 100.5, needs vanco trough tonight before 4am dose, needs
   another sputum cx sent sice previous one contaminated.
   Plan:
   Send new sputum cx, cont with q 6 to 8 hr Tylenol, check blood cx,
   Subdural hemorrhage (SDH)
   Assessment:
   Pt lethargic to alert, inconsistently following commands, moves all
   exts, lifts both arms, uses both legs to push self up in chair, perrla
   at 2mm, waxws and wanes from napping to constantly fidgeting in the bed
   or chair,
   Action:
   Cont to attempt to reorient pt, q 3 hr neuron checks, fent sedation
   remains 150mcg, seroquel inc to 50 mg tid
   Response:
   Reorientation not effective, pt contintues to have episodes of
   restlessness, does not follow commands consistenly, can be combative
   Plan:
   Cont with neuron checks q 3 hrs, try to restablish normal sleeping
   pattern, limit sedation meds,
   Volume overload: pt currently only 50 cc negative despite lasix inc to
   20 mg tid, will inform md, ? checking evening lytes. Team wants pt [**2-18**]
   liters negative
